4.name: Eni-sensei
4.text: "Yes... How does it look to you, Sol?"

5.name: Sol
5.text:
"Um... um...! There's a slightly unpleasant
smell... It feels like someone, you know, a bad
person is hiding..."

6.name: Eni-sensei
6.text:
"I see. ...Recently, it seems that some bandits
have settled in this forest and are causing
mischief."

7.name: Eni-sensei
7.text:
"Many people have gone missing and become victims,
killed or even abducted by them. We cannot leave
their mischief unchecked."

8.name: Eni-sensei
8.text:
"We will consider their subjugation as Sol's
graduation exam. Is that alright?"

9.name: Sol
9.text: "Y-Yes! I'll bite with all my might!!"

10.name: Eni-sensei
10.text:
"Very well. This time, I will also follow Sol's
instructions. I can't go all out, but... I leave
it to you."

20.name: Narration
20.text:
The female adventurer, in a tense whisper, stops
Sol and hides herself. Sol is momentarily taken
aback, but immediately understands the intention
behind her actions and follows suit.

22.name: Eni-sensei
22.text:
(Yes, enemies... I sense the presence of probably
three. And... there's one person who has been
captured.)

23.name: Sol
23.text: (T-Then, let's hurry and go rescue them...!)

24.name: Eni-sensei
24.text:
(No, if we go out now, we'll end up exposing that
person to danger as a hostage. Let's wait a little
longer and choose the right timing.)

37.name: Sol
37.text:
"I-I did my best... fufi... Sensei, is this person
going to be okay...?"

38.name: Eni-sensei
38.text:
"Yes, it seems there are no life-threatening
injuries. It would be best to let them rest here
for a while."

39.name: Eni-sensei
39.text:
"And don't let your guard down. There's probably
still a main force remaining."
